pages.text: Blindsights are hostile creatures that can be found in Glowstone Canyons.$(br2)They will use their strong legs and tongue to jump and snatch Glowsquitos or you.$(br2)On death the may drop a Blindsight Tongue, you can use it to craft a Fungus & Tongue Stew, that will give to you Jump Boost II for 30 seconds.
You can use it to craft a Blindsight Tongue Whip too.
